de.intranda.digiverso.presentation.servlets.rest.content

Class ContentResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.intranda.digiverso.presentation.servlets.rest.content.ContentResource

  • @Path(value="/content")
public class ContentResource
extends java.lang.Object
    Resource for delivering content documents such as ALTO and plain full-text.
